jobDescription:
Job opening for Service Coordinator with Zinq ELECTRONICS at Navi Mumbai



NOTE- If Interested mail me your updated CV on careers@zinq.in



Company Website: www.zinq.in

Company Address: ZINQ ELECTRONICS PVT. LTD.

418-419, 4th Floor, Platinum Technopark,

Near Vashi Station, Vashi, Navi Mumbai - 400703




Job description

1.Handling of Corporate Accounts and looking after Service issues for Pan India Levels.
2.Handling and supporting team for Installations, Amc Maintenance Renewals - PM's, ,
3. Looking after the installation and delivery of products at customer's locations.
4.To discuss the service improvement plans and decide on action plans and to see to the closure of discussed points.
5.Solving the service complaints within the turnaround time and enhancing the relationship with the client so as to ensure new business Process / coordinate sales order with operations department & logistic department to meet delivery schedule of customer.
6.Dispatch the material received from the factory. Follow up with transporter for pickup of the material & delivery of the same.
7. Provide dispatch details to the customer. Preparation of monthly sales report (MIS & maintaining the records of quotation, service charges, complaints in excel.
8.Coordination with Accounts department regarding receipt of the payment from customer.
9.Follow up with customer for payment & receipt of the material.

title: Hiring For Process Associate - Ghansoli, Navi Mumbai
tagsAndSkills: Blended Process,Good Communication In English,International Process,Email Process,Customer Handling,Customer Support,Solving Queries,Chat Process
jobDescription:
About the Role:

Were looking for a positive and solution-minded candidate to take on the responsibility of day-to-day client services through our ticketing system and order management. The candidate should be able to handle multiple inquiries and tasks simultaneously and work with different departments while understanding the overall processes.

Responsibilities:

  • Management of tickets through Zoho and response time within the agreed SLA.
  • Resolving client inquiries through email, phone, and ticketing systems, e.g., password updates, delivery information, report requests, product information, order management, etc.
  • Work with internal departments to resolve any discrepancies that may arise.
  • Ability to generate and run reports through MS Excel and different tools and present the dashboard to the Client to share the status of Orders & Tickets.
  • Assist with billing questions and coordinate with the Finance department.
  • Process orders, follow up with vendors or account managers, and resolve issues raised by the Customer.
  • Work closely with the Client & Account Managers.

Requirements:

•       Open to work in the US & Night Shifts and be open to rotational shifts & weekly offs.

•       Should be able to cope with pressure situations and be available during the peak season.

•       Should be able to prioritize the work as per the agreed deadlines and be open to learning new tasks & multi-task.

•       Open to work on weekends based on business requirements.

Qualifications, Experience & Skills:

•       The candidate should be a graduate.

•       Fresher candidate with excellent written & oral communication skills to manage the Customer Service/Concierge Ticketing.

•       Experienced candidates with working knowledge of handling client inquiries via email, phone, and ticketing systems.

•       Previous experience working with ERP systems is a plus.

•       Experience working with International Clients will be an added advantage.

•       Working knowledge of MS Office (preferably MS Excel).

FRESHERS CAN ALSO APPLY!

title: Client Servicing Executive
jobDescription:
Key Responsibilities:
Client Interaction:

Act as the first point of contact for clients, addressing their inquiries and providing solutions to their concerns.
Maintain regular communication with clients to ensure their needs are met and they are satisfied with the services provided.
Support & Coordination:

Assist in coordinating client projects, ensuring that all tasks are completed on time and meet the clients expectations.
Work closely with internal teams to relay client requirements and ensure seamless execution of client requests.
Documentation:

Prepare and maintain detailed records of client interactions, including meeting notes, feedback, and action items.
Assist in the preparation of client reports, presentations, and other documents as needed.

Location: Thane,Navi Mumbai,Mumbai,Dombivli,Panvel,mumbai all areas, MUMBAI SUBURBS, kalyan,
